trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Clean Paste
trans-unit.target: htmlArea RTE > Clean Paste

trans-unit.source: The Clean Paste feature offers options for cleaning content copied from external source before it gets pasted into the editing area.
trans-unit.target: The Clean Paste feature offers options for cleaning content copied from external source before it gets pasted into the editing area.

trans-unit.source:
This feature is useful when pasting text that was copied to the clipboard from some external source.
The "Clean paste" button allows to toggle to clean paste mode and back to normal paste mode. Clicking on the "Clean paste" button puts the button "on". This action does not initiate any paste operation. But when the "clean paste" button is "on" in the RTE tool bar, whenever a paste operation is performed, content contained in the clipboard is transformed before being pasted into the editing area. Clicking again on the toggle button puts it "off". Any subsequent paste operation is performed as a normal paste.
trans-unit.target:
This feature is useful when pasting text that was copied to the clipboard from some external source.
The "Clean paste" button allows to toggle to clean paste mode and back to normal paste mode. Clicking on the "Clean paste" button puts the button "on". This action does not initiate any paste operation. But when the "clean paste" button is "on" in the RTE tool bar, whenever a paste operation is performed, content contained in the clipboard is transformed before being pasted into the editing area. Clicking again on the toggle button puts it "off". Any subsequent paste operation is performed as a normal paste.

trans-unit.source: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/PlainText/skin/images/paste-toggle.gif, EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/PlainText/skin/images/paste-behaviour.gif
trans-unit.target: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/PlainText/skin/images/paste-toggle.gif, EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/PlainText/skin/images/paste-behaviour.gif

trans-unit.source: "Clean paste" toggle icon in the editor tool bar. Clicking on it changes the behaviour of subsequent paste operations. "Clean Paste Behaviour" icon in the editor tool bar. Clicking on it opens a dialogue that allows to select an alternate paste behaviour.
trans-unit.target: "Clean paste" toggle icon in the editor tool bar. Clicking on it changes the behaviour of subsequent paste operations. "Clean Paste Behaviour" icon in the editor tool bar. Clicking on it opens a dialogue that allows to select an alternate paste behaviour.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour

trans-unit.source: Select a paste behaviour
trans-unit.target: Select a paste behaviour

trans-unit.source: Select one of the three alternate paste behaviours.
trans-unit.target: Select one of the three alternate paste behaviours.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:plainText,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:pasteStructure,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:pasteFormat,_MOD_user_setup
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:plainText,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:pasteStructure,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:pasteFormat,_MOD_user_setup

trans-unit.source: Paste as plain text
trans-unit.target: Paste as plain text

trans-unit.source: When this paste behaviour is enabled, all HTML markup is removed before content is pasted in the editing area.
trans-unit.target: When this paste behaviour is enabled, all HTML markup is removed before content is pasted in the editing area.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour

trans-unit.source: Paste structure only
trans-unit.target: Paste structure only

trans-unit.source: When this paste behaviour is enabled and content is pasted in the editing area, only structural HTML markup is retained, all format is removed.
trans-unit.target: When this paste behaviour is enabled and content is pasted in the editing area, only structural HTML markup is retained, all format is removed.

trans-unit.source:
By default, "Structure only" means that: - only the following HTML elements are retained: a, p, h[0-6], pre, address, blockquote, div, hr, br, table, thead, tbody, tfoot, caption, tr, th, td, ul, ol, dl, li, dt, dd; - the following HTML attributes are removed: id, style, class, lang, align, valign, bgcolor, color, border, face, any attribute starting with "on", and any attribute containing ":".
These defaults may be modified in Page TSConfig.
trans-unit.target:
By default, "Structure only" means that: - only the following HTML elements are retained: a, p, h[0-6], pre, address, blockquote, div, hr, br, table, thead, tbody, tfoot, caption, tr, th, td, ul, ol, dl, li, dt, dd; - the following HTML attributes are removed: id, style, class, lang, align, valign, bgcolor, color, border, face, any attribute starting with "on", and any attribute containing ":".
These defaults may be modified in Page TSConfig.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour

trans-unit.source: Paste structure and basic format
trans-unit.target: Paste structure and basic format

trans-unit.source: When this paste behaviour is enabled and content is pasted in the editing area, structural HTML markup is preserved as well as basic format provided by inline HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: When this paste behaviour is enabled and content is pasted in the editing area, structural HTML markup is preserved as well as basic format provided by inline HTML elements.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_PlainText:behaviour

trans-unit.source: Contents pasted into this pasting pad will be cleaned. Click OK to insert the cleaned contents into the RTE editing area.
trans-unit.target: Contents pasted into this pasting pad will be cleaned. Click OK to insert the cleaned contents into the RTE editing area.

trans-unit.source: When using Internet Explorer and when pasting behaviour "Paste structure only" or "Paste structure and format" is enabled, contents must first be pasted into this pasting pad so that they can be cleaned before being inserted into the RTE editing area.
trans-unit.target: When using Internet Explorer and when pasting behaviour "Paste structure only" or "Paste structure and format" is enabled, contents must first be pasted into this pasting pad so that they can be cleaned before being inserted into the RTE editing area.
